summary: Puppeteer Li Tian-lu tells his life story, and through it, the story of Taiwan in the first half of the 20th century.
cast: Tien-Lu Li|Giong Lim|Kuei-Chung Cheng|Chien-ru Huang|Liou Hung|Tung-Hsiu Kao|Hei Li|Wenchang Li|Wen-Pin Liu|Ming-Hua Pai|I. Toshiro|Chen-Nan Tsai|Yi-Hua Tsai|Juwei Tzuo|Li-Yin Yang
title: El maestro de marionetas
